Name: BOXiGON!
About the game: WELCOME to the Original~BOXiGON! 3D-PUZZLES hand-crafted for you! Practice color sorting ability up to BOXiGON~MASTER! Can you unlock the BOX? FEATURES: ~ 4 SKILL-LEVELS: - NEWB, PRO, NEO, MASTER. ~ 8 PUZZLE-DIMENSIONS: - SIMPLEX, FLOWERGARDEN, GRIDPRYZM, RADIASTAR, - COLORTEMPLE, STARLOCK, COREONE, CORETWO. ~ 12 STEAM-ACHIEVEMENTS. ~ 72 CHALLENGING VARIATIONS to become a BOXiGON~MASTER! INSTRUCTIONS: ~ ALIGN color tiles with ORBS. ~ Click TILE to SWAP positions. ~ Click ORB to see HINTS. ~ TEXT TIPS show in the lower-left. ALSO: ~ Look for BONUS~POINTS! ~ Gradually challenging difficulty. ~ And solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER! WARNING: Flashing lights: special care was taken to reduce flashing lights. Warning: low fidelity visual explosions. Color blindness: game does not include color-blind options. Please let us know if color-blind mode benefits you and we will update. CONTACT US: Please give your feedback and support on twitter at BOXiGON. BOXiGONV2 in the works! Thank you for playing. CREDITS: Image credit: NASA, ESA, and the Hubble Heritage Team (STScI/AURA), derivative use. Music Soundtrack Credit to: Eric Matayas (see attached link). DESIGN, DEV & ANM JackFalcon. Dev by falconcrew. NetCinematics Nash West. 3D Puzzles by Envolveron. (c) 2018 NetCinematics llc. All rights reserved.
